name: Turnip the Heat!
description:
The root of a good party is a good host: keep the tub toasty and clean, get the drinks and d'ourves flowing, and satisfy your steamy guests in this rootin tootin party panic! Just keep an eye on your InstaYam or your bustling buds buzz'll be busted...

Controls:

  • Move: Arrows/WASD/Mouse/Gamepad sticks/D-Pad
  • Interact: Space/Enter/Z/X/Click and hold/Gamepad face buttons

Made for Global Game Jam 2023 with PixiJS by Michael, Sean, IAN, and Ryan.

All assets created in JS Paint.
